text: Va [dar in hangom] kasone, ki [dar dunjo az rahʙaroni gumrohgar] pajravi karda ʙudand, megujand: "Kos ʙaroi mo ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] ʙud, to hamon guna, ki onon az mo ʙezori custand, [mo niz] az onho ʙezori cuem. Alloh taolo cunin raftori esonro, ki mojai hasratason ast, ʙa onho nison medihad va hargiz az otasi [duzax] ʙerun naxohand omad
